segments.text: How long has it been like this ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you have a sleeping problem ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I even can't fall asleep these days .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think you'd better have a further exam , and before the result comes out , try to relax yourself and take the medicine before you sleep . It will help you to kill the pain and make you sleep well .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: When the result comes out , I will tell you about it . Remember , never be afraid or be too tired .
segments.speaker: S1
